Package org.gridgain.client.message

Defines messages that are used in binary TCP communication between GridGain clients and nodes.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
GridClientMessage Interface for all client messages.
 

Class Summary
GridClientAbstractMessage This class provides implementation for commit message fields and cannot be used directly.
GridClientAuthenticationRequest Client authentication request.
GridClientCacheRequest<K,V> Generic cache request.
GridClientLogRequest Request for a log file.
GridClientNodeBean Node bean.
GridClientNodeMetricsBean Node metrics bean.
GridClientPingPacket Fictive ping packet.
GridClientResultBean Bean representing client operation result.
GridClientTaskRequest Task command request.
GridClientTaskResultBean Task result.
GridClientTopologyRequest Topology command request.
 

Enum Summary
GridClientCacheRequest.GridCacheOperation Available cache operations
 

Package org.gridgain.client.message Description

Defines messages that are used in binary TCP communication between GridGain clients and nodes.
